mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS airline_id, a.title AS airline_title, c.id AS company_id, c.title AS company_title FROM airlines a JOIN company c ON c.id = a.company_id;
SELECT a.id AS airline_id, a.title AS airline_title, c.id AS company_id, c.title AS company_title FROM airlines a JOIN company c ON c.id = a.company_id WHERE c.id = #{company.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO airlines (id, title, company_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{company.id}) AS new ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = new.title, company_id = new.company_id
mapper.update: UPDATE airlines SET title = #{title}, company_id = #{company.id}, WHERE id = #{id}
